summary: The Great Seal of the United States has a phrase, "novus ordo seclorum," which means "New Order of the Ages." Some people think this refers to a secret global government, called the New World Order. They believe powerful people are working together to rule the world and replace countries with one big government. This idea, called a conspiracy theory, has been around for a long time and has made some people very worried. Experts say these theories can cause problems in politics and even lead to violence.
title: New World Order conspiracy theory
